1.content: Deploy Chef Warehouse System to web space
1.details:
1. Temporarily disable i18n middleware
2. Rebuild with static export
3. Deploy to public URL
4. Test deployment functionality

3.content: Enhance Admin Dashboard with Chef Management
3.details: 1. Add /app/admin/chefs/ route for chef management 2. Create chef analytics and reporting 3. Add chef verification workflow 4. Build chef booking oversight system 5. Add revenue analytics for chef services

4.details: 1. Add CRM models (CustomerTag, Lead, CRMNote, SalesActivity) 2. Create lead tracking and conversion funnel 3. Build customer segmentation and tagging system 4. Add sales activity logging and notes 5. Create marketing campaign tracking

5.details: 1. Set up PostGIS for advanced geospatial queries 2. Create location zones and delivery areas 3. Implement location-based search and filtering 4. Add Google Maps integration 5. Build delivery zone management system
